Articles.Content:
I was very happy to read about 0.9. Went out and bought me a paysafecard for 30 Ã¢â€šÂ¬, as the store told me the price is 28Ã¢â€šÂ¬. Came back, went to the shop, accepted the 0,38 Ã¢â€šÂ¬ additional fee for paysafe and went to the payment side of paysafe. Typed in my code = insufficient amount of cash. Paysafe says me it will cost 37,45 USD?!

So what now, how to get it steam-less for 28 Ã¢â€šÂ¬ via paysafe?!

Edited December 16, 2014 by Schaufel

Hi Schaufel, can you please email [email protected] regarding this issue as there is nothing we can do to address it here on the forums.

We're volunteers here and don't have the kind of access we'd need to deal with purchasing.

You will likely be asked for proof of purchase by the support team.

Good luck

Ty, sal_vager. Did that already, but was wondering if someone on the forum did run in the same problem. Have not got a answer yet.

Anyhow the purchase has to be cancelled anytime by me, as paysafe give me no other option. Even combination of different paysafecards is not possible, as the upper limit for this is 30 Ã¢â€šÂ¬.

This issue does come up occasionally and can take a few days to sort out, but you say you have not purchased and you cannot because the price has gone up?

There may be nothing that can be done for you in this regard, the price does increase with major updates.

A offer for 28 Ã¢â€šÂ¬ should be purchasable for 28 Ã¢â€šÂ¬, right? So maybe the offered price for 0.9 is not up to date?

Needless to say that I have bought the paysafecard as my personal christmas gift and now sitting here empty handed.

double-----

Edited December 16, 2014 by Schaufel

As combination of paysafecards over 30Ã¢â€šÂ¬ is not possible, I would have to buy a new one for 50 Ã¢â€šÂ¬. Then I can purchase, having left ~15 Ã¢â€šÂ¬ on this card plus 30Ã¢â€šÂ¬ of the first paysafecard. So in total I have to buy cards for 80 Ã¢â€šÂ¬, just because a offer of 28Ã¢â€šÂ¬ is not a binding offer anymore? Com'on...

Still no reply by customer service...

Edited December 16, 2014 by Schaufel

It's the spambot trap, don't worry about that, it lets us catch advertising bots before they turn the forums into the shopping channel, now you have enough posts you're past it.

You can make larger payments by combining up to 10 paysafecard PINs.

That is from their website, you can combine paysafe cards to get a higher value, and to be honest it sounds like your issue is with them rather than Squad.

So you need another two $10 cards it seems, and you'll have around $5 left over.

Edit:

I suggest you wait for a sale anyway, like, around Christmas maybe, there's bound to be one

Edited December 16, 2014 by sal_vager

Sorry, that's a negative, sal.

Rightout off the payment dialogue of this deal:

"Bitte beachte: Wenn du paysafecard PINs kombinierst, darf der Wert deiner Zahlung maximal 30 Euro betragen."

English meaning: "Attention. If paysafecards pins are combined, the amount of payment has to be 30 Ã¢â€šÂ¬ max."

They seem to change their terms of usement, as I switch my underwear.

So, it is as i have written above.
Zero respond from any administration, no solution here. Guess I'll spent my money somewhere else. Really sad

It's on sale for steam now.

Try PayPal if you don't want it from steam?
I have exactly the same problem. 30Ã¢â€šÂ¬ Paysafe Card, and cannot buy the 28Ã¢â€šÂ¬ Game. And no, PayPal is not possible for me!

Hi Schaufel,

as of 25. of April 2015 this issue still exists.

Ã¢â€šÂ¬28.38 including Paysafe fee written on the KSB Store and USD37.something when redirected on the paysafe site.

As I do have a Steam Account, I gave them a chance and: Ã¢â€šÂ¬28.00 paid finally (Ã¢â€šÂ¬-,38 saved).

I thought Paysafe would be great to use, but again I have got disappointed from one of those great global services.

Good of stam: You can extract the game at least under Linux, to use it "standalone". Don't know, if this works for Windows.

Happy landings.

Carsten

Zero respond from any administration, no solution here. Guess I'll spent my money somewhere else. Really sad
